review: I expected great things from this device and for the most part I have not been disappointed. I like how small it is and well the remote works. I like how quickly I can access Amazon streaming as well as my list of things to watch. Additionally, it loads Netflix much faster than my blu-ray player did. However, it has one nagging problem. It seems to have a small cache. I have noticed on Sunday afternoons that it repeatedly needs to rebuffer in the middle of watching a show or movie. Sometimes to the point that it sticks at 25% I need to stop play and restart. I've confirmed that my blu-ray player does not do this. I'm concluding that the cable network is busier on a Sunday afternoon than when I usually watch streaming vids and that the Fire TV Stick needs a larger cache to store buffered video.
